item.title: 【Cinema Center】MOVIE - Because.I.Said.So.2007.1080p.HMAX.WEB-DL.DD5.1.x264-Samuel
item.description:
Because I Said So


1 HR 41 MIN • PG-13 • 2007 • HD • 5.1 • COMEDY • DRAMA

Description
A mother desperately seeks a suitor for her sweet, but perpetually single youngest daughter in this romantic comedy.
Click to expand...
Trailers & Clips
Click to expand...
Accessibility
Audio languages: English (United States), Spanish (Latin American)
Subtitles: English US (SDH), Spanish (Latin American) (CC)
Click to expand...
More Information
Genres
Comedy, Drama, Romance, Teen

Runtime
1 hr 41 min

About This Movie
Single mother Daphne (Diane Keaton) has married off her two oldest girls, but as her 60th birthday approaches, she's frantic about her youngest daughter Milly (Mandy Moore). Not wanting to see the lovely girl turn into a lonely old maid, Daphne takes her daughter's love life into her own hands--even personally interviewing potential beaus--much to Milly's mortification!
